allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Key Notes field to competitor hover tooltips

- Added keyNotes to Notion sync script property mapping
- Added keyNotes field to hardcoded fallback data in App.jsx
- Updated tooltip to conditionally display Key Notes \(gray, italic\)
- Added keyNotes field to competitors-data.json

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge remote main and add Key Notes field to tooltips

- Added keyNotes to Notion sync script property mapping
- Added keyNotes field to hardcoded fallback data in App.jsx
- Updated tooltip to conditionally display Key Notes \(gray, italic\)
- Added keyNotes field to competitors-data.json
- Resolved merge conflicts, kept ES module syntax for sync script

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
